def_cn: 不中用的人（或物）；废物；草包
def_en: If you describe someone or something as a lame duck, you are critical of them because they are not successful and need to be helped a lot.

def_cn: （因任期将满等）无实权的官员（或政府）
def_en: If you refer to a politician or a government as a lame duck, you mean that they have little real power, for example because their period of office is coming to an end.
